Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 72nd overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Injured on 4/7/2015 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2015, off James Patterson (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2015, hitting .520 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 9/4/2015 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2017, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2017, hitting .402 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Injured on 8/13/2017 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 9/8/2018 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/3/2018: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $7,250,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 7/7/2019...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago on 9/11/2019...
Injured on 4/14/2020 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
